title: LFM - OCE Open League!
body:
i am making a oce open league team
we have some already have some people

Deep Sanity (Top)
Iknowyourname (Mid)
XRYUUK (Support)
ConcretewalruS (Adc)

 In-game name 
- Preferred role
- Roles you can play
- Availability (days of the week, hours/day, approximations fine)
- communications if you have any

you will need to play trail games though so add -Deep Sanity

replies.body:
- In-game name: xRyuuk
- Preferred role: Support
- Roles you can play : Mid/ADC
- Availability (days of the week, hours/day, approximations fine): Anytime, anyday, pretty much free for the next few months
- communications if you have any: Skype

In-game name: KingDinger
- Preferred role: ADC
- Roles you can play: Support/Jungle/Mid
- Availability (days of the week, hours/day, approximations fine): Erry day. but at night. like past 9PM usually.
- communications if you have any: erry thang. Skype TS3 CV. can get raidcall or w/e else.
